verses.text: 你要提醒他們服從執政的和掌權的，聽從他們，隨時準備作各種善工。

words.note: Refers to those in governmental authority, as in Rom 13.
Synonymous with '執政的', emphasizing holding power.
Refers to righteous actions or good deeds commanded by God.

verses.text: 不可毀謗人，要與人無爭，謙恭有禮，向眾人表現充分溫柔的心。

words.note: A four-character idiom (成語) describing polite and humble conduct.

verses.text: 我們從前也是無知、不順服、受了迷惑、被各種私慾和逸樂所奴役，生活在惡毒和嫉妒之中，是可憎可惡的，並且互相仇視。

words.note: Refers to a state of spiritual ignorance or lack of understanding.
Often used in the Bible to describe spiritual deception.
Refers to carnal or unholy desires.
Used with 被 (bèi) to indicate the agent of a passive action.

verses.text: 然而，到了 神我們的救主顯明他的恩慈和憐愛的時候，
他就救了我們，並不是由於我們所行的義，而是照著他的憐憫，藉著重生的洗和聖靈的更新。

words.definition: it is not at all, certainly not
words.note: Emphatic negation, 'definitely not'.
Used before a verb to form a nominalized phrase, 'that which is done'.
Refers to the cleansing of baptism.

verses.text: 聖靈就是 神藉著我們的救主耶穌基督豐豐富富澆灌在我們身上的，

words.note: Refers to the Holy Spirit as a divine person.
Refers to the Christian God.
A reduplication of 豐富 (rich, abundant).

verses.text: 使我們既然因著他的恩典得稱為義，就可以憑著永生的盼望成為後嗣。

breakdown.m: to obtain, to be able to

words.note: A theological term for justification.

verses.text: 這話是可信的，我願你確實地強調這些事，使信 神的人常常留心作善工；這些都是美事，並且是對人有益的。

words.note: Reduplication of 常 (often, regular).

words.definition: to pay attention, to be diligent

verses.heading: Summary of the Letter

verses.text: 你要遠避愚昧的辯論、家譜、紛爭和律法上的爭執，因為這都是虛妄無益的。
分門結黨的人，警戒一兩次之後，就要和他絕交。

words.note: Idiom describing forming factions or divisions.
Indicates a small, indefinite number of times.
To terminate a relationship or fellowship.

verses.text: 你知道這種人已經背道，常常犯罪，定了自己的罪。

words.note: Refers to turning away from the faith.

verses.text: 我派亞提馬或推基古到你那裡去的時候，你要趕快到尼哥波立來見我，因為我已決定在那裡過冬。
verses.heading: Final Instructions and Greeting

verses.text: 你要盡力資助西納律師和亞波羅的旅程，使他們不致缺乏。
我們自己的人也應當學習作善工，供應日常的需要，免得不結果子。

words.note: Refers to righteous deeds or ministries.
Figuratively means to produce good outcomes or spiritual results.

verses.text: 同我在一起的人都向你問安。請你問候那些因信而愛我們的人。願恩惠與你們眾人同在。

words.note: Common in biblical greetings.
Formal or literary conjunction/preposition.
Common expression for God's presence or fellowship.
